title: Lenny Trčková
text:
Lenny Trčková (born August 5, 1978) is a <a href="Czechs">Czech</a> <a href="radio%20presenter">radio presenter</a>, <a href="TV%20presenter">TV presenter</a> and <a href="Model%20%28person%29">model</a>. She lives in <a href="Prague">Prague</a>.
She hosts "Host Óčka" ("Ocko's guest") and "Inbox" TV shows on Czech music channel <a href="%C3%93%C4%8Dko">Óčko</a>. She also hosts "I.D." and "Ranní kuropění - Wake up call" shows on <a href="%C4%8Cesk%C3%BD%20rozhlas">Czech radio</a> station ČRo 4 – Radio Wave.
Biography.
Trčková was born in <a href="Slavi%C4%8D%C3%ADn">Slavičín</a>, <a href="Czechoslovakia">Czechoslovakia</a> (now <a href="Czech%20Republic">Czech Republic</a>) where she also studied and graduated from secondary school, with a major in economics. She worked in many areas of economics until 2001. During that time she was also interested in cultural and musical events, helping to run a movie theatre, and co-founding a local music festival, "Festiválek".
In 1999 she moved to <a href="Prague">Prague</a> and began working as a <a href="radio%20presenter">radio presenter</a> and <a href="TV%20presenter">TV presenter</a>. She worked with radio Frekvence 1 ("Na titulní straně"), Fajn rádio ("Fajn ráno"), Express radio ("D'rano") and on TV Praha ("Maestro") and <a href="%C4%8Cesk%C3%A1%20televize">Czech television</a> ("Styl" ).
Later, she started to host movie premieres and special events (<a href="Elite%20Model%20Look">Elite Model Look</a>, Hairdresser of the year, <a href="Diesel%20S.p.A.">Diesel</a> party, Fashion show of Klára Nademlýnská etc.).
Personal.
Trčková’s main hobbies are music, singing, books, horse riding, design and fashion.
